rescuecore2.standard.score

Class CiviliansAliveScoreFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.score.AbstractScoreFunction
      • rescuecore2.standard.score.CiviliansAliveScoreFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreFunction

    public class CiviliansAliveScoreFunction
extends AbstractScoreFunction
    Score function that measures the number of living civilians. One point per civilian still alive.
